The diagram depicts the four steps used when debugging PPP. A man is on a host computer, that is connected to a simple two router network. The host is connected to R1. R1 is connected to R2 via a serial link.

The man thinks, "I cannot connect to R2."

Step 1.
Identify the problem.
Step 2.
Use the debug ppp negotiation command.
Step 3.
Use the debug ppp negotiation command.
Step 4.
Once the problem has been identified implement a solution.

The man thinks, "I see the error, I will change the R2 to CHAP and try again."
